Downloads

You can download Not So TUF in binary form from my website. Supported on Mac, Linux 32bit & 64bit, Windows & Linux Arm Raspberry Pi - Tested on Rasbian

Binaries are auto-updated to the most recent stable version. Updater will attempt a patch update before downloading a full binary. Patches are applied sequentially. Say your at version 1 and two updates have been put out. The current version is 3. The updater will download the patch1-2 and 2-3 verify and apply them to get you to version 3. Total download around 50kb. Currently patches are about 24kb in size. If something fails along the way the updater will download the full binary. Currently around 7mb in size.
